traits.name: Air Form
traits.description: The elemental can enter a creature’s space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two Thunderous Slam attacks.

actions.name: Thunderous Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 10 ft. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Thunder damage.

actions.name: Whirlwind
actions.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 13, one Medium or smaller creature in the elemental’s space. Failure: 24 (4d10 + 2) Thunder damage, and the target is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the elemental and has the Prone condition. Success: Half damage only.
